description: Spain's child abuse laws are set for an overhaul under the new government thanks to James Rhodes.
title: British pianist James Rhodes drives child abuse reform in Spain
title_page: British pianist James Rhodes drives child abuse reform in Spain - BBC News
maintext: As well as making it easier for children to report abuse and only having to testify once before a specialised judge, the law will focus on prevention and education. It will also change the statute of limitations so that these crimes will not expire until 15 years after the victim is 30 years old, instead of counting from the age of 18.
